author: rpimentel71
content: Hello everyone ! I'd be thankful for any info providing details about how EIP 1559 tips are going to be added to the staking rewards in the consensus layer.

author: ralexstokes
content: the best way to think about it is that they do not touch the consensus layer

author: ralexstokes
content: each execution payload declares a "fee recipient" that functions just like the `coinbase` in the current protocol

author: rpimentel71
content: Thanks for your feedback. Following that line of thought, would it be accurate to say that whomever needs to extract complete reward info would need to extract all components of the final reward from both the consensus node (validator/proposer reward) as well as from the execution node (transactional fees) ?

author: ralexstokes
content: for every validator, track their consensus rewards and for each fee recipient they have, include any income to that set of addresses
